entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy ending early this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
